mapper.sql: id, name, address, administrative_interval, product_id, create_time, isdelete, brand, corporate_representative, approval_announcement_no_enterprise, uniform_social_credit_code, approval_authority_enterprise, approval_year
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_enterprise
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_enterprise (id, name, address, administrative_interval, product_id, create_time, isdelete, brand, corporate_representative, approval_announcement_no_enterprise, uniform_social_credit_code, approval_authority_enterprise, approval_year ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{administrativeInterval,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corporateRepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalAnnouncementNoEnterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uniformSocialCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalAuthorityEnterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update tb_enterprise
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
administrative_interval = #{record.administrativeInterval,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_id = #{record.productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isdelete = #{record.isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
brand = #{record.brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
administrative_interval = #{administrativeInterval,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
corporate_representative = #{corporateRepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approval_announcement_no_enterprise = #{approvalAnnouncementNoEnterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

approval_year = #{approvalYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_enterprise set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, administrative_interval = #{administrativeInterval,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, corporate_representative = #{corporateRepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approval_announcement_no_enterprise = #{approvalAnnouncementNoEnterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uniform_social_credit_code = #{uniformSocialCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approval_authority_enterprise = #{approvalAuthorityEnterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approval_year = #{approvalYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(1),approval_year from tb_enterprise group by approval_year

select id,name from tb_enterprise where id in
#{item}

select
SUBSTR(administrative_id FROM 1 FOR 4) as area , count(1 ) as countNum
administrative_id as area, count( t.id ) as countNum
from tb_product_enterprise_chart t1 left join tb_enterprise t2 on t2.id = t1.enterprise_id WHERE 1 = 1
and t2.approval_year =#{year}
and classification_id IN ( SELECT classificationId FROM tb_classification WHERE parentId = #{classification} )
and administrative_id in (select city_id from tb_administrative_area where parent_id = #{parentId})
and administrative_id = #{parentId}
GROUP BY
SUBSTR(administrative_id , 1 ,4)
administrative_id
ORDER BY count( 1 )
